external.gw.api.bean.compare

Interface EntityMatcher<T extends gw.pl.external.entity.KeyableEntity>

  • Deprecated. 
    External entities are deprecated. Please use the new Java API instead.

    @Deprecated
public interface EntityMatcher<T extends gw.pl.external.entity.KeyableEntity>
    Interface for matching two different entity instances to determine if they logically represent the same entity. Semantics are identical to <code>external.gw.api.diff.BeanMatcher#doBeansMatch(gw.pl.external.entity.KeyableEntity, gw.pl.external.entity.KeyableEntity) BeanMatcher</code>.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean doEntitiesMatch(T source, T compare)
      Deprecated. 
      Determine if two beans are really the same "thing" -- i.e. they represent the same logical entity.
      java.util.Comparator getMatchPrioritizer(T toBeMatched)
      Deprecated. 
      To assist with the case where there are multiple matches for an entity, this method returns a Comparator to determine the closest match.

    • Method Detail

      • doEntitiesMatch

        boolean doEntitiesMatch(T source,
                      T compare)
        Deprecated. 
        Determine if two beans are really the same "thing" -- i.e. they represent the same logical entity. For example, a com.guidewire.ab.external.entity.Person might be considered to match another com.guidewire.ab.external.entity.Person if they have the same TaxID.
        Parameters:
        source - The source entity
        compare - The entity against which the source is compared
        Returns:
        True if the two entities are logically the same entity

      • getMatchPrioritizer

        java.util.Comparator getMatchPrioritizer(T toBeMatched)
        Deprecated. 
        To assist with the case where there are multiple matches for an entity, this method returns a Comparator to determine the closest match.
        Parameters:
        toBeMatched - The bean that is being matched; all other beans passed to the comparator are assumed to match this bean
        Returns:
        The comparator where lower sort order indicates higher priority
